abilities.description: Allows the user to manipulate gravitational forces at will, including increasing or decreasing the gravity in a specific area.
Can use gravity manipulation to pull meteors from outer space and direct them toward targets on the ground with devastating force.
Channels gravitational forces through the user's sword to slice through objects, including meteors.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone

notes: The Zushi Zushi no Mi is one of the most powerful Paramecia-type Devil Fruits, allowing its user to control gravity. In Episode 643, Fujitora demonstrates the true scale of this power by summoning a meteor from outer space, shocking both Law and Doflamingo. This ability establishes the Zushi Zushi no Mi as having one of the widest ranges of any Devil Fruit power, capable of affecting objects in space.
